title: Mr. September
description: From international bestselling author Nicole S. Goodin, comes a new standalone, Single Parent Romance.  Brody Owens. Ex-basketball superstar. Newly appointed coach. … And knight in shining armour.  Morgan Bradley. Gorgeous single mum. Lonely woman. … And saved by Mr. Tall, Dark and Handsome.  After fate crosses Brody and Morgan’s paths, he’s desperate to know more about the stunning blonde who he rescued from danger. When she reappears in the last place he expected, complete with a truck load of baggage, Brody has to decide if he’s up for the challenge of being her man.  Brody wants to keep Morgan safe. Morgan wants to protect the walls she’s built.  Will Brody break her heart, just like the man before him? Or will Morgan find herself threatened by something other than love?
author: Nicole S. Goodin
